name: HomeBank
summary: Free, easy, personal accounting for everyone
description: HomeBank is a fast, simple and easy to use program to manage your personal accounting. It differs from gnucash for the better look and feel, and for the greatest start-up speed. It has a lot of features such as easy analysis with graphical charts (statistics, budget, overdrawn, car cost), useful reports ("Where your money goes", "Trend Time Report" ), multi-accounts support, budget management, reminder, import from OFX/QFX-CSV files, visual status of operations. It is based on GTK2.
